messages.title: Please don’t get conned again
messages.content: On 9th June we will wake up to a Conservative Government I will work with that Government to ensure that we get the Brexit we voted for. I will stand for only a single term or as long as it takes for Brexit to truly happen.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce a points based system and restore full border controls.
Recruit 20,000 more police officers and 20,000 more soldiers. Rebuild our armed services. Oppose Military intervention in the Middle East
One legal system for all - no Sharia courts. Defending hard won equality and freedom of speech.
Rather than give our money away it will be used to fund 20,000 nurses and 10,000 GPs. Scrap hospital parking fees.

issues.health: Rather than give our money away it will be used to fund 20,000 nurses and 10,000 GPs. Scrap hospital parking fees.
issues.immigration: Introduce a points based system and restore full border controls.

housing.content: Only a Vote for UKIP is a vote for BREXIT

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains criticisms towards the 'Theresa May Gang' and mentions a 'gang of con artists'. It discusses the local issue of Havering Council Tax going up and opposition to converting greenbelt land in Hornchurch and Upminster.
